text: Anchonastus is a genus of African huntsman spiders that was first described by Eugène Louis Simon in 1898. ==Species== it contains four species, found in Africa: *Anchonastus caudatus Simon, 1898 (type) – Cameroon *Anchonastus gertschi Lessert, 1946 – Congo *Anchonastus pilipodus (Strand, 1913) – Central Africa *Anchonastus plumosus (Pocock, 1900) – West Africa ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of Africa
title: Anchonastus
